channel.title: A child of God and programming artist
channel.description: Recent content on A child of God and programming artist

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Kevin Hernández. I believe in the LORD God through whom all things were created — Colossians 1:16. My aim is always to give the glory, the honor and the power due his name. As a functional artist, I write useful code and attempt to solve problems (with code) in the most elegant way.
